text: Lethal Weapon 4 is a 1998 comedy-action movie. Danny Glover plays Roger. Mel Gibson plays Martin. Rene Russo plays Lorna Cole. Chris Rock plays Lee. The movie was released on July 10, 1998. It got mixed to negative reviews from critics. However, it made about $285 million. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1998 action movies Category:1998 comedy movies Category:1998 movies Category:English-language movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Richard Donner
title: Lethal Weapon 4
